name: Need for Speed World
description:
Need for Speed World is a racing-arcade massively multiplayer game developed by Electronic Arts Black Box and Electronic Arts Singapore. It came out on 27-07-2010. It was published by Electronic Arts. On review aggregator Metacritic, Need for Speed World has a score of 62. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Need for Speed World is available on PC.
Mick Gordon scored the game.
